terms.definition:
The 10th Anniversary Survivors are a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
One extinguishing lantern after another, the grizzled foursome persevered. The insight gleaned from their life in the darkness has ignited a spark of ingenuity.

In celebration of 10 years since the release of the first Kingdom Death figure, we revisit the starting survivors of Monster, Allister, Zachary, Lucy, and Erza. A lantern decade into their survival, these re-imagined figures show the ingenuity and grit required to endure the darkness.

The 10th Anniversary Survivor figures are accompanied by Patterns for Kingdom Death: Monster. A Pattern represents a spark of crafting inspiration that accompanies insight gleaned about the world. When survivors reach their insights, draw a Pattern. It will describe what to use and how to craft a brand new piece of gear. When these crafting elements are assembled a new idea takes physical form.

Contents.
4x Hard plastic 10th Anniversary Survivors (Allister, Zachary, Lucy, Erza)
4x Hard plastic 30mm unique scenic base inserts
4x Hard plastic 30mm bases 
6x Pattern cards
8x Pattern gear cards
Pattern rules sheet
4x Large matte print of the concept artwork for each survivor on heavy card stock

Card List.

Pattern Cards.
Plated Shield
Telcric Eye Tac
Tempered Axe
Tempered Dagger
Tempered Spear
Vault Key Earrings

Pattern Gear.
Plated Shield
Telcric Eye Tac
2x Tempered Axe
2x Tempered Dagger
Tempered Spear
Vault Key Earrings

The 10th Anniversary White Speaker is a White Box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
The White Speaker was the first miniature released by Kingdom Death. In celebration of 10 years since the release of the first Kingdom Death figure, we revisit the White Speaker cultist and her enigmatic relationship to the survivors' settlement. A brand new sculpt finds the White Speaker a lantern decade later, posed with a ritual dagger, ready to tell a brand new story of blood.

The 10th Anniversary White Speaker includes new content and rules for Kingdom Death: Monster. Along with a Strain milestone that continues the story after the White Speaker stories are revealed, the survivors have a chance to learn a new type of evolving fighting art.

Contents.
1x Hard plastic 10th Anniversary White Speaker 
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Strain Milestone card
4x Story of Blood strain fighting art cards
Story of Blood/Strain system double-sided rules sheet
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Numbered commemorative card
Card List.

Strain Milestone Card.
Plot Twist

Strain Fighting Arts Cards.
Story of Blood 1
Story of Blood 2
Story of Blood 3
Story of Blood 4

Allison the Twilight Knight is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features content that integrates with the core game, and alters the Hooded Knight story event.

Store Description.
Clad in dark bronze armor and robed in a deep hooded cloak, the Twilight Knights stand on the edge of the known world, their lives devoted to battling foul creatures and horrifying abominations to shield the weak from such peril. 

Contents.
1x Hard plastic Allison the Twilight Knight
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Tattered Parcel story event sticker
1x Blue Lantern and Dormant Twilight Cloak rare gear cards
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock.

Model History.
Allison the Twilight Knight is a character that was created based on the Pinup Twilight Knight model. Originally she was dubbed a Pinup Reversal, and was revealed as a promo add-on for the Kingdom Death: Monster 1.0 Kickstarter campaign; normally pinups are created based off existing Lore/Character/Monster models, while Allison is a character that was created based on a Pinup model.Kingdom Death Kickstarter 1.0 Campaign, Update #59

Allison was eventually released as a White Box product on the Kingdom Death Shop, and is also being included in the Promos of Death box set that was created for the Kingdom Death: Monster 1.5 Kickstarter Campaign.

See Also.
The Legendary Card Pack

References.

Black Friday Ninja is a holiday white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features promotional content that does not integrated with the core game.

Store Description.
The Black Friday Ninja arrives on the darkest day of the year. Once a year, Black Friday Ninjas steal out from their hidden fortress to sneak to the front of any queue.

Contents.

BlackFridayNinja3.png
BlackFridayNinja4.png

1x Hard plastic Black Friday Ninja miniature
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Black Friday Lantern promo gear card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock

Variant Release.
A special pinup variant of the Black Friday Ninja was released on Black Friday 2019. This miniature was cast in photoresin instead of hard plastic, features less clothes and alternate artwork, and does not come with the promo Black Friday Lantern gear card.

Contents.

Detective Twilight Knight is a White Box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features promotional content that can be used in the core game.

Store Description.
A hard-boiled take on the iconic Kingdom Death Pinup Twilight Knight, the Detective Twilight Knight comes equipped with the Twilight Revolver and Detective Cap promo gear cards, equipment perfect for tackling that one last case.

Contents.
Hard plastic Detective Twilight Knight
Kingdom Death 30mm hard plastic base and insert
Matte Art Print
Detective Cap and Twilight Revolver promo gear cards for use in Monster

Echoes of Death is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Distant, familiar memories, echoes of heroic melodies shape the survivors.

Echoes of Death includes 4 unique survivors represent memories from another world. These memories can be unlocked by reaching unique milestones in the story of your campaign.

This set includes prototypes of Strain System mechanics. Add your Strain Cards to your game, if you reach their unique milestone conditions, your gameplay changes forever by adding new fighting arts to your game.

Contents.
4x Hard plastic Echoes of Death Survivors (Thief, Mage, Necromancer, and Fighter)
4x Hard plastic 30mm round bases with inserts
4x Strain milestone cards
4x Strain fighting art cards
Prototype strain system rules sheet
4x Large matte prints of the original concept artworks on heavy card stock

Card List.

Strain Milestones.
1x Ethereal Culture Strain
1x Giant's Strain
1x Opportunist Strain
1x Trepanning Strain

Strain Fighting Arts.
1x Backstabber
1x Ethereal Pact
1x Giant's Blood
1x Infinite Lives

See Also.
Echoes of Death 2
Thief
Mage
Necromancer
Fighter

Echoes of Death 2 is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Distant memories, echoes of heroic melodies shape the survivors.

Echoes of Death 2 includes 4 new survivors that embody memories from another world. These memories can be unlocked by reaching unique milestones in the story of your campaign.

This set includes prototypes of Strain System mechanics. Add your Strain Milestone cards to your game, if you reach their unique conditions, your gameplay changes forever. A new fighting art borne from distant dreams is permanently added to your game.

Contents.
4x Hard plastic Echoes of Death 2 survivors (Cleric, Ranger, Gladiator, and Bard)
4x Hard plastic 30mm round bases
4x Hard plastic base inserts (2 scenic base inserts for the Cleric and Bard)
4x Strain milestone cards
4x Strain fighting art cards
1x Strain milestone card divider
1x Stain fighting art card divider
Prototype strain system rules sheet
4x Large matte prints of the original concept artworks on heavy card stock
Card List.

Strain Milestones.
1x Hyper Cerebellum
1x Marrow Transformation
1x Memetic Symphony
1x Surgical Sight

Strain Fighting Arts.
1x Convalescer
1x Infernal Rhythm
1x Rolling Gait
1x Shielderang

See Also.

Bard
Gladiator
Ranger

Fade is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Fade violated the White Speakers' oath against childbearing. Expecting no mercy, she fled the cult with her child and the Sword of Silence stolen from the Sword Hunters' armory.

Contents.
1x Hard plastic Fade
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Baby and the Sword hunt event card 
1x Newborn and Sword of Silence rare gear cards
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock

is a special Screaming Antelope AI card and a survivor status found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game.

Card Text.
When you gain this, remove your survivor from the board and place them on this card. Then, Crush & Devour.

At the start of your act, Crush & Devour - Masticated.

If the monster suffers 2 wounds in a single round, Crush & Devour - Regurgitate.

is a special Christmas-themed white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Christmas is but once a year, and so is this Nico! This exclusive version of White Speaker Nico comes with a custom base, art, and a seasonal settlement event that rewards the nice.

Contents.
1x Hard plastic 
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Story in the Snow settlement event card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Character art card
An ability. When you are a returning survivor, once per lantern year, you may spend to Intimacy.

When you travel 4 or more spaces from movement or knockback without passing over the same space twice, gain +1 momentum token.

When you successfully Tumble, gain +1 momentum token.

When you are knocked down, lose all your momentum tokens.

Percival is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Percival is a member of a small order called the Black Knights. The Black Knights were founded by a militaristic settlement that hoped to conqueror the darkness and provide a safe haven for humanity. A great crusade called the Black Knights into action and Percival left her home never to be seen again. Before leaving, she commanded her loyal companion, a young puppy, to wait for her safe return. He still waits to this day.

Contents.
1x Hard plastic Percival
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Black Guard Style secret fighting art card
1x Dead Warrior basic hunt event card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock

Limited Release.

The Percival was originally released as a limited resin release with a First Run limited to 500 miniatures. Since the release of the Percival white box, the resin miniature will no longer be released as an Encore.
Contents.
1x Resin Percival
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Character art card
Hand-numbered certificate of authenticity (if First Run)

See Also.
Black Knight

is a special Watcher AI card and a Survivor Status Card found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It also describes a set of rules used during Showdown: Watcher and The Messenger of Humanity.

Rules.
A retinue represents the settlement uniting to fight together. Each retinue occupies 9 spaces and is made up of 9 unused survivor miniatures. A retinue cannot attack monsters directly, and instead lends its strength to other survivors.

A retinue is treated as a single large survivor, and moves as a cohesive unit on the showdown board, maintaing its configuration. Retinues have the following rules:

Targeting and Effects.
A retinue does not count as a threat, and cannot directly be picked or selected as a target. Only monster collision and actions that apply to all survivors can affect a retinue. A retinue has no attributes. and cannot be knocked down. suffer knockback, or gain status cards. For the purpose of survivor collision, treat retinues as impassable terrain. 

Killing a Retinue.
When a retinue suffers damage (including brain damage) or collision with a monster. roll 1d10 on a result of 4+. the retinue is destroyed. A retinue also is destroyed when a monster ends its movement on a space it occupies, or when the survivor controlling, the retinue dies. When a retinue is destroyed, remove it from the showdown board. The settlement suffers -4 population. This loss cannot kill the other survivors currently in the showdown.

Using a Retinue.
A survivor with the Retinue survivor status card can perform the following actions:

Summon Retinue: Once per act, a survivor without a retinue may place a retinue in an unoccupied space along and board edge and move it up to 5 spaces.

March: At the start of their act, a survivor with a retinue gains an additional that may only be spent to move their retinue up to 5 spaces.

Double March: Once per round, anytime a survivor can dash, they may spend 1 survival to dash their retinue up to 5 spaces (in addition to their own dash survival action).

Coordinated Attack: When a survivor attacks, add +6 strength to the wound attempt total for each retinue adjacent to them.

Card Text.
You may Summon a Retinue, March, Double March, and Coordinated Attack.

(Full rules for Retinue can be found on the Watcher Showdown story event).

is a special Watcher AI card and a Survivor Status Card found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. 

Card Text.
You cannot gain Stolen Dreams if you have 9+ Courage and Understanding. When you gain this, you are knocked down. You remain knocked down as long as you have this card.

At the end of your act. if there are 2 or more of any combination of survivors or retinue adjacent to you, archive this card and stand.

The female Survivor is a Limited Release resin miniature.

Store Description.
Hunted as prey, herded and domesticated as draft animals, humans occupy a low rung on the food chain of Kingdom Deaths many strange ecosystems. Often living unawares of their purpose, occasionally, nightmarish trauma will snap an ignorant human from their delusion of safety. These survivors are often shaped by the particular events that tears the veil from their eyes; some driven by vengeance, grief, curiosity, or insanity, they share a desperate desire to persist despite the horror of their newly discovered reality. Survivors are marked by the artifacts they create from the ordeal that put them on their new path.

Contents.
Female Survivor resin miniature
Alternate helmet and weapon
Kingdom Death 25mm resin square base
Matte art print
Hand-numbered authenticity note (First Run only)

Notes.
While this miniature is called Survivor (Female), it is also been referred to as "Aya the Survivor".

See Also.
Before the Wall
Beyond the Wall
Death High Aya
Sci-Fi Aya

Swashbuckler is a generic white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
The Swashbuckler is the result of a collaboration between Adam & Lokman, exploring some well established tropes in fantasy art. Originally intended as a small line of Generic Hero Classes, the results were so compelling and un-generic, each hero's appearance told so many exciting stories that we wanted to integrate them into the KD world but so far nothing concrete has emerged.

Plundering indiscriminately, the swashbuckler's crippling kleptomania keeps her ship barely bobbing over the surface of the waves. Lost at sea as a child, she spent years surviving alone on a deserted island. Scavenging for scraps to eke out a meager existence she pathologically finds need to ransack her victims for strange odds and ends.

Her fate took a turn when she boarded a cursed galleon, stealing a coat of otherworldly splendor. The coat, armed with spectral pistols fires at random, often causing violent accidents and winning her no friends.

Contents.
1x Hard plastic miniature
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with unique insert
1x Corsair Coat rare gear card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock

Notes.
This is currently the only miniature in the Generic line that features content that integrates with Kingdom Death: Monster.

Till Death Do Us Part is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features prototype content that can be integrated with the core game, and alters the Partnership innovation.

Store Description.
When the lantern light is at its dimmest, there's no one else I'd rather have at my back. The Intimacy Couple faces peril together, unflinching faith in their union to the end, even as it draws near.

This cinematic pair is accompanied by new Kingdom Death: Monster promo material: prototype rules. Principle: Bonding is a lasting choice. Decide what partnership means to your settlement and replace your partnership innovation. Will partners strive for a lasting legacy in the future or to leave the biggest mark on the world with their combined fury. These rules are optional content for your game that may have far-reaching consequences for your campaign. Prototype rules are currently evaluated at KD HQ but we enjoy their thematic possibilities and offer this new content as is.

Contents.
1x Photoresin Intimacy Couple Male miniature
1x Photoresin Intimacy Couple Female miniature
1x Hard plastic 50mm round base with insert
2x Hard plastic 30mm round bases with inserts
Principle: Bonding prototype rules card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Signed and numbered authenticity note (if First Run Edition)

White Speaker is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features content that integrates with the core game, and alters the White Speaker story event.

Store Description.
The White Speaker's face, hidden behind a veil aptly symbolizes the strange cult of towering women warriors. Their savage blood magic and battle readiness are notorious but almost nothing is known about the secrets that unite them.
Limited Release Description

Contents.
1x Hard plastic White Speaker
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Wares for Trade story event sticker
1x Speaker Cult Knife and Bloodskin rare gear cards
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock

Previous Releases.
The White Speaker has seen three previous releases, before the release of the plastic white box kit. The first is an extremely rare version cast in pewter. The second was the Limited Resin Release that had a First Run of 100 miniatures, and the third was a more widely available General Release. Since the release of the white box these versions of the miniature are no longer produced as Encores.

Limited Release Contents.
1x Resin White Speaker
1x Resin square base
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Hand-numbered vellum certificate of authenticity 

General Release Contents.
1x Resin White Speaker
1x Resin square base
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Character art card

Notes.
The name of the White Speaker is Koshka.

See Also.
The Legendary Card Pack

WS2.png
WS3.png

The White Speaker Sword Hunter is a white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It features content that integrates with the core game, including a new settlement event, a new hunt event and a new piece of rare gear.

Store Description.
There was a settlement of humans so powerful that they defied one of the great entities. In response, the entity drank their only lake and waited for them to turn to dust. Undaunted, the humans grew plants rich in water and survived. The furious entity took up its mantle and invaded, wiping out the humans. It left one man as a warning, cursed with an unslakable thirst.

Desperate to end his suffering, the man took up the sword, mastering it with single-minded focus. Exactly 1000 years to the day, the Prince of the Sword stood triumphant over the dying entity. Drinking its blood quenched his thirst for the first time but did not end his torment. Eternally he wanders drinking the blood of worthy adversaries to momentarily satisfy his thirst.

White Speakers that tell the Story of the Prince of Swords seek the taste of blood stains and remnants of gore on ancient weapons. In this way gaining the prowess of their former wielders.

For this White Box release, your settlement may cross paths with the Sword Hunter. While on the hunt, fortunate survivors may draw the sword from the stone. Upon returning to the settlement, its legendary existence may attract the attention of the Sword Hunter. 

Contents.
1x Hard plastic White Speaker Sword Hunter
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base & insert
1x Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
1x Character art card
1x Sword in the Stone hunt event
1x Sword Hunter settlement event 
1x Excalibur rare gear

Previous Release.
The White Speaker Sword Hunter was originally released as a limited resin release with a First Run limited to 500 miniatures. Since the release of the white box, the resin miniature will no longer be released as an Encore. Notably, this version of the does not wear the iconic White Speaker blindfold.

Contents.
1x Resin 
1x Hard plastic 30mm round base with insert
1x Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
1x Character art card
Hand-numbered certificate of authenticity (if First Run)

X-mas Special Pinup Twilight Knight is a special Christmas-themed pinup white box expansion for the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. This white box expansion features content that integrates with the core game.

Store Description.
Exclusive to the festive season, this special edition hard plastic Xmas Pinup Twilight Knight is dressed for Xmas cheer. It includes a cheeky, timely holiday costume, a unique decorative base insert, a handsomely wrapped gift, and a festive axe (the Xmaxe!!).

For extra holiday cheer this item also includes an Xmaxe promo gear card to be used in Kingdom Death: Monster. Spread joy and gore!!

Contents.
1x Hard plastic Xmas Spacial Pinup Twilight Knight (includes gift box and 3 Xmaxes for survivors)
1x Hard plastic 50mm base
1x Xmaxe gear card
Large matte print of the original concept artwork on heavy card stock
Character art card

Notes.
While the store description for this product lists the Xmaxe as a promo gear card, it does have a regular black gear backing as well as a crafting recipe that allows it to be integrated into the game.
